task.title: Eclipse Plugin Installation - Update Site Method

context.p: The following Eclipse versions are officially supported: . The steps for installing the Eclipse plugin with the Update Site method are as follows:

step.cmd: Go to Help Install New Software Available Software .
Click Add in the Available Software dialog box.

Enter http://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Editor/Eclipse/site.xmlhttp://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Author/Eclipse/site.xmlhttp://www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Developer/Eclipse/site.xml into the Location field of the Add Site dialog box.
Click Next > and continue with the rest of the installation wizard.

Verify that is installed correctly by creating a new XML Project. Go to File New Other and choose
XML Project .
When prompted for a license key, enter the license information received in the registration email.
step.info: Note that if you already have a native version of installed on your computer, you will not be prompted for a license key for the Eclipse version. The existing license key will be used automatically.
